alert.note: Alert for Hickman; Lawrence; Lewis; Maury; Perry; Wayne (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 9:51AM CDT until August 07 at 10:30AM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Lewis County in Middle Tennessee... Wayne County in Middle Tennessee... Lawrence County in Middle Tennessee... Western Maury County in Middle Tennessee... Perry County in Middle Tennessee... Hickman County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 1030 AM CDT. * At 950 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Parsons to 6 miles southwest of Shiloh, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lawrenceburg, Hohenwald, Centerville, Waynesboro, Linden, Mount Pleasant, Loretto, Collinwood, Summertown, Clifton, Lobelville, St. Joseph, Ethridge, Gordonsburg, Kimmins, Henryville, Busseltown, Primm Springs, Flatwoods and Lutts. This includes Interstate 40 near mile marker 149. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Hickman; Lawrence; Lewis; Maury; Perry; Wayne
